SELECT coinCode as coinCode,SUM(entrustCount) as entrustCount FROM ex_entrust WHERE
type='1' and (`status`='2' OR `status`='3' OR `status`='1') GROUP BY coinCode ORDER BY entrustCount desc

select * from ( select e.entrustPrice,sum(e.surplusEntrustCount) as entrustCount,sum(e.surplusEntrustCount) as surplusEntrustCount,sum(e.entrustSum-e.transactionSum) as entrustSum from ex_entrust as e where
e.coinCode=#{coinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.type = 2 and e.entrustWay =1 and e.status in (0,1)
group by e.entrustPrice order by e.entrustPrice limit 0,#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) as f order by f.entrustPrice desc
